dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS tries to get his bearings-- he's in the park area, FACILITY not too far off. He moves in that direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE GATE to the garage OPENS, an empty HUMAN TRANSPORT emerges... FIND MARCUS, concealed, still unclothed. He di under the GATE as it rolls shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS moves stealthily through the space where the priso were off-loaded, keeping out of sight behind parked vehic He starts at the sight of--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE CONTROL ROBOTS, hooked to CHARGING POSTS along one wa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS makes his way to the GLASS DOORS.   Using all his strength, he manages to PRY THEM OPEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ENGINEER as we saw him before, consulting the MONITOR above the CHAMBERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 32581 looks good... 32582... hm, borderline. May not be emotionally compatible. Pass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The engineer picks up STAR'S BASEBALL CAP and flings it i the TRASH...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then he hears SHATTERING GLASS behind him.   He spin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS trains a ripped-off ROBOTIC LASER ARM at him like weapon. The arm trails heavy CABLES and CIRCUITS, linking to the operating theater we saw earlier. (These also artfully conceal Marcus' nakedness.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let them go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?   Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS takes a step closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said, let them go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ENGINEER moves to a RED ALARM BUTTON on a COMMUNICATI PANEL mounted in the wall, extending a hand--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS connects two wires to FIRE UP the LASER and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A RED BEAM neatly SEVERS the ENGINEER'S HAND at his WRIST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ENGINEER studies the metal STUMP of his severed hand a blank expression.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't hurt me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ENGINEER smirks and WHACKS the ALARM BUTTON with his other hand. An ELECTRONIC KLAXON sounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you're pissing me off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS FIRES OFF THE LASER again--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --THE ENGINEER stares at him-- we see a flaming STRIP in wall behind his head. He takes a step toward Marcus and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --his HEAD TUMBLES OFF, bounces on the ground, and rolls MARCUS' FEET. (There's no blood, just laser-severed electronic connections).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS picks up the ENGINEER'S HEAD by the hair.   The ma brain is unharmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (cont'd) How'd that feel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE MAN'S MOUTH twists and grimaces, making ELECTRONIC ST from the FRIED VOICEBOX. MARCUS is taken by surprise when

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --THE DECAPITATED BODY lunges at him, knocks the LASER fr his grasp. After a brief STRUGGLE, MARCUS spins the engineer's HEAD to face his body. He grabs the INTERFACE the base of his neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (cont'd) I pull this off and you'll be in a world of pain!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ENGINEER'S FACE suddenly shows fear-- his body FREEZE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (cont'd) Last chance. Let them out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AT A CONTROL TERMINAL, the one-handed, headless BODY taps keys and controls. MARCUS holds the Engineer's HEAD so th he can see over his own shoulder. Moments later--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --the MACHINE HUM winds down. THE MONITORS flash the word "ABORT," the PANELS begin to OPEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS addresses the HEAD in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (cont'd) I'm gonna need your clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE HEADLESS BODY begins to unbutton its shirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOMENTS LATER - CLOSE as KYLE'S TRAY slides out of his CHAMBER. The RESTRAINTS retract automatically. He sits up looking toward--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --STAR, on the next tray.   She hasn't moved, her eyes cl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He climbs off his tray, takes her in his arms.    She sta awake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Around them, the dozen OTHER PRISONERS are getting to the feet, surprised at their sudden freedom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS approaches KYLE, buttoning his new shirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marcus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two kids hurry to him, Marcus hands Star her BASEBALL CAP, rescued from the trash. As she puts it on:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew you'd come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE PRISONERS are already on the move, frantically dashin out of the lab ahead of our heros.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've gotta get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leads the kids out the way he came, passing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ENGINEER, in underwear, sitting in a corner, cradling head in his lap. His remaining hand strokes his interface his eyes closed in a blissful expression.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE PRISONERS smash the GLASS DOORS off their hinges, and charge past--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE CONTROL ROBOTS, which are now coming to life. ELECTRI BURSTS drop a couple of slow-moving ESCAPEES as they dash into the garage and make for--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --ANY AVAILABLE VEHICLE. Former PRISONERS hijack BUSES, HYDROGEN CARS. Pure chaos, it feels like a prison riot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS, STAR and KYLE weave amidst the robots and humans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE and STAR take cover behind a concrete post just as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --PLASMA BURSTS explode around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SKELETAL TERMINATORS armed with PLASMA RIFLES are pouring through the OPENING GARAGE GATE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A STOLEN BUS heads for the exit, KNOCKING a couple of TERMINATORS aside and SMASHING through the rising GATE, clearing a path for others to follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SKELETAL TERMINATOR sets its sights on a MOVING HYDROGE CAR, which follows the bus--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TERMINATOR POV - RED FILTER, HIGHLIGHTING BULL, the DRIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TERMINATOR SHOOTS HIS RIFLE through the car's windshi it EXPLODES, close to KYLE and STAR, the building SHAKES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE and STAR flee the flames, THE TERMINATOR'S HEAD swiv quickly, taking them in. It starts to pursue, but MARCUS gets in front of it. Before it can fire--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (cont'd) It's OK, I'm not human!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Terminator pauses, looks him over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TERMINATOR POV - MARCUS is quickly scanned, comes up "NON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE   TERMINATOR starts to move past Marcus, who LEAPS on and   WRENCHES THE RIFLE from its grasp. As the robot spi him   he BLOWS ITS HEAD OFF, then looks around franticall the   kids. A moment later--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --KYLE ROARS up at the controls of a futuristic ATV, STAR clinging to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (cont'd) You can't drive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No time to argue, MARCUS leaps into the back beside STAR KYLE GUNS IT out of there, careening off walls and other vehicles, he's still not much of a driver. MARCUS meanwhi PICKS OFF potential threats with the PLASMA RIFLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE has to swerve to avoid the stolen BUS, which is now its side, IN FLAMES. It was taken out by--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --an automated SKYNET TANK, one of THREE TANKS here. They positioned to take out escaping vehicles. But the ATV is small, maneuverable target, swerving and speeding crazily TANK FIRES and MISSES, the BLAST taking out a chunk of wa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE WHOOPS, heading across the campus--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --ONE TANK pursues, it moves surprisingly fast, capable o flattening anything in its path. MARCUS FIRES at it, but PLASMA RIFLE BLASTS don't have much effect on the ARMOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TANK FIRES again, but--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --KYLE ROARS around a corner, just in time.   However, in doing, he nearly runs over--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --MARCUS, from earlier, on his way to the time sphere, visible in the HEADLIGHTS for only an instant before he L OUT OF THE WAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE, focused on the pursuing tank, didn't even see this. But STAR did. She looks wide-eyed at MARCUS beside her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That looked like--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.   Long story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLAY THE CHASE, as the TANK pursues the ATV through the facility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE takes his vehicle through a large FOUNTAIN, which th TANK SMASHES to bits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE OVERSTEERS, putting them up on two wheels, then recovers, narrowly avoiding--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --PLASMA BLASTS, which obliterate the FACADE of a buildin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SKELETAL TERMINATORS appear in their HEADLIGHTS, weapons raised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS stands and FIRES over KYLE'S HEAD, BLOWING them ou the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEAR THE PARK, MARCUS points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (cont'd) Take that path!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TANK is gaining on them, KYLE steers around a GAZEBO, tank SMASHES right through it, turning it to splinters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The trees!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle steers toward THE WOODS, dodging between the thick TREES. Too many obstacles for the TANK here, it SCREECHES A HALT and lets off a JET OF FLAME.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TREES behind the ATV all IGNITE, turning to acrid poo of MELTING PLASTIC. KYLE barely stays ahead of the FIRE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TANK backs up and takes a new route, around the woods

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN THE WOODS, KYLE strikes a GLANCING BLOW against a tree trunk, and the ATV TOPPLES on its side, spilling its passengers. After a beat, they rise, shaken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (cont'd) You two all right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you drive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on I was doing good!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS rights the vehicle, taking the wheel, the kids cli in back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ATV comes rocketing down the main street, MARCUS driv now. Suddenly, directly in front of them--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --THE TANK APPEARS, moving swiftly around a corner, GUN TURRET SWIVELING at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AS IT FIRES, MARCUS SWERVES onto a LAWN and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --CRASHES THROUGH a PICTURE WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A handsome HYBRID COUPLE, in pajamas in front of a BIG SC TV. They turn and react as the ATV skitters through the r and down a hallway. The ATV is followed a moment later by

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --THE TANK, which TAKES OUT THE ENTIRE WALL, BARRELLING through the living room and BURYING the HYBRIDS in RUBBLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS takes the ATV UP A FLIGHT OF STAIRS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TANK keeps SMASHING through the house, as its TURRET SWIVELS upward and BLASTS AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: UPSTAIRS - THE PLASMA BLAST COMES THROUGH the FLOOR, just missing the ATV as it rockets through a MASTER BEDROOM, toward a BALCONY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOWNSTAIRS - THE TANK tears through an upscale RECREATION ROOM, splintering a POOL TABLE, smashing through PINBALL MACHINES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: UPSTAIRS - MARCUS takes the ATV straight out onto the BALCONY, THROUGH THE RAILING and INTO THE AIR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOWNSTAIRS - THE TANK BLASTS THROUGH a KITCHEN and BATHRO on its way out the other side of the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ATV JUST CLEARS an enormous SWIMMING POOL, landing ha on the far deck and moving on, fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TANK SMASHES THROUGH THE BACK WALL and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --TAKES A NOSEDIVE into the pool, out of commission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE RUBBLE in the living room shifts and the HYBRID COUPL extract themselves, taking in their destroyed home with placid expressions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A moment's breather. Marcus slows the vehicle, which WOBB and SMOKES from all it's been through. He looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points toward the COAST, we see a MARINA in the distan a BOAT moored at a DOCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS steers the ATV down a slope toward the shoreline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS, KYLE and STAR leap off the ATV and sprint for a MOTORBOAT. Kyle carries the rifle now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they near the boat, MARCUS reacts to the sight of--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --RED EYES FLICKERING in the darkness at the END OF THE D the BLUE GLOW of a RIFLE CHARGING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS leaps in front of KYLE and STAR shielding them wit his BODY. The PLASMA BLAST envelops him, MARCUS is blown-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --INTO THE WATER. KYLE and STAR are flattened by the forc of the blast, lie motionless on the dock. Their PLASMA RI lies a few feet away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SKELETAL TERMINATOR who shot Marcus moves swiftly dow the dock, its PLASMA RIFLE trained on the water now. It moves past Kyle and Star, who remain motionless on the ground, and goes to the edge of the dock--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --BLAM! STAR snatches up their own PLASMA WEAPON, and BLA the thing in the back, knocking it INTO THE WATER, which only a few feet deep here. As it rises, SHE FIRES again, taking the Terminator's head off. It goes under.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SKY is beginning to LIGHTEN now as, a moment later, MARCUS EMERGES. As he climbs from the shallow water back onto the dock, Kyle and Star stare at him with astonishme

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seeing their expressions, he checks himself for damage-- there's METAL exposed at his shoulder, arm and hand, his partially TORN AWAY, ONE EYE MISSING. He tries to speak, can only manage an ELECTRONIC CROAK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle and Star back away from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not real.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marcus shakes his head, starts to move toward them.   STA raises the rifle, points it at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't come any closer!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hear a WHISTLING SOUND from shore, hit the deck as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --a MISSILE BLAST TAKES OUT THE BOAT and a large chunk of DOCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laying low, they look up to see--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --a small army of TANKS and TERMINATORS approaching... ev HUNTER-KILLER moving in from the horizon, swinging its SPOTLIGHT in all directions. It looks like the last stand

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS turns back to KYLE and STAR.   His voice is a dist WHISPER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Star puts the rifle aside, with an apologetic expression. She moves to Marcus, gingerly touches his exposed metal-- then hugs him tightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle, more stoical, looks out to sea.   His expression changes, becomes almost hopeful as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --IN THE DISTANCE, a HUGE, BLACK SHAPE rises to the surfa of the water, just visible against the dawn horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FIREWORKS! MISSILES blast the H-K... NAPALM erupts around the TANKS and TERMINATOR ARMY as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --A SQUAD OF A-10s SCREAM IN from over the land, FIRING CANNONS, launching AIR-TO GROUND MISSILES to take out the TANKS. ONE A-10 flies low overhead and WAGS ITS WINGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAIR at the controls, helmeted with her face exposed, le out a VICTORY WHOOP as she looks out her canopy at the huddled humans below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE points to the dark shape on the water-- now visible huge SUBMARINE with the RISING SUN behind it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HIGH ANGLE as ZODIAC BOATS reach land. HAZ-MAT SUITED SOLDIERS leap out and run to our heroes at what remains o the dock, others head inland to provide covering FIRE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS addresses a TEAM LEADER, who's taken aback at his frightening appearance and distorted voice:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are more prisoners, a complex about a mile in--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As MARCUS gives the man a few more directions--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --ONE HAZ-MAT FIGURE, standing a few feet off, studies Ky and approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's your name, son?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle Reese.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The figure pulls off a glove and unzips his mask, extends hand. It's JOHN CONNOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John Connor. I'm glad you made it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE is amazed to be meeting the man face-to-face. He sha hands, wide-eyed and speechless. It's a strange moment fo Connor, too, for different reasons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CONNOR turns away from his first meeting with his father be, a bit dizzy at the experience. He addresses Marcus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CONNOR (cont'd) Seems I owe you an apology.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS smiles as best he can, given his ruined face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, well. Get in line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER, as CONNOR replaces his mask, moves to direct his troops. MARCUS, KYLE and STAR stay close together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Near the ENGINE ROOM, a couple dozen RESCUED PRISONERS ar being treated by unarmed MEDICAL PERSONNEL, others huddle under blankets with food and drink. KATE is among those helping the former prisoners.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE and STAR eat ravenously, he finishes one MRE and gra up another. A few feet away, MARCUS leans against a wall, plasma RIFLE at his side. A DOCTOR examines him warily, prodding his injured face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does this hurt?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't feel a thing.    Help somebody else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doctor moves on as a couple of HAZ-MAT SUITED FIGURES come down the ladder from the hatch, FACE-MASKS removed. Among them is CONNOR. KATE moves to his side as more daze HUMANS come down. She speaks quietly, eying KYLE nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your dad-- he seems like a nice kid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connor can't deal with that at the moment, speaks loudly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last boatload is right behind me. Skynet's pouring in reinforcements, we can't hold this place. And the people in the houses, they won't leave--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're not people anymore...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He trails off, reacting to the sight of--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FAMILIAR FIGURE descending the ladder, in a long coat, down. She looks up to make eye contact... SERENA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (cont'd) No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLO-MO:   seeing Marcus, Serena reaches into her coat--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS moves at the same time, to grab his PLASMA RIFLE--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SERENA leaps off the ladder, aiming a small, powerful PLA WEAPON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SERENA fires first--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! THE PLASMA BLAST catches MARCUS in the shoulder and BLOWS his GUN ARM clean off. His PLASMA RIFLE discharges, BLOWING a HOLE in the side of the sub, near the floor-- W gushes in like a FIREHOSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LEAVE SLO-MO. Spun around by the force of the blast, MARC lands on his back, SPARKS and SEVERED CABLES protruding f his damaged shoulder. An ALARM KLAXON SOUNDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PRISONERS and DOCTORS SCREAM and scramble for cover--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CONNOR steps in front of KATE to shield her, they back aw through the WATER BLAST, CONNOR FIRING at SERENA--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SERENA takes numerous HITS from the EXPLOSIVE BULLETS, wh take off PIECES of her, but she keeps coming, FIRES again

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --HITTING CONNOR in the lower abdomen. He's thrown backwa KATE cries out and throws herself on top of him. His gun gone flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SERENA turns her attention to MARCUS, standing over him, plasma weapon aimed point-blank at his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why, Marcus? You were immortal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS manages a smile as he shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one lives forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! MULTIPLE PLASMA BLASTS from behind RIDDLE SERENA'S TORSO, the BLUE PULSES burning right through her-- her HE takes a hit, the STEEL is RUPTURED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE PLASMA WEAPON flies out of her arms, she COLLAPSES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON HER FACE, as she turns to see who got her--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no one there.    But ON THE FLOOR lies--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --MARCUS' SEVERED ARM, still holding his PLASMA RIFLE. hand RELEASES the weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SERENA'S HEAD tilts, her eyes go blank-- she's dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MEDICAL PERSONNEL are doing what they can to help CONNOR, blood at his lips, KATE and KYLE at his side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This... this can't happen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SUBMARINE "LOS ANGELES" moves TOWARD CAMERA as it slo SINKS deeper beneath the water's surface. We see a makesh STEEL PATCH welded near the hatch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS waits outside the entrance to the SICKBAY. He's cleaned up a bit, wears fresh clothes (one sleeve pinned He seems weary, wrung out, his systems damaged. He'll mov stiffly through the following scene, like a stroke victim

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STAR sits beside him, a hand on his arm.   BLAIR approach from down the corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marcus... I need to head back to my unit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS nods, keeps his head bowed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAIR (cont'd) What about you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His voice is still WEAK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no idea. I should be dead...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you're alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a half-smile) So to speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've been ordered not to talk about it-- the hybrids, everything about that place is top secret...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, simpler to keep it man versus machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Star gingerly reaches up to touch the torn plastic at the back of Marcus' head, where the interface was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did it feel like?   To be... one of them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (thoughtful beat) Better than anything. Everything made sense. For the first time in my life, I felt... right. It was heaven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How could you give that up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to her, exposing his mangled face, one eye gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never really believed in heaven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAIR takes this in, fishes in a pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here.   You need these more than I do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She holds out a PAIR OF SUNGLASSES.     MARCUS, a bit amu slips them on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE DOOR opens nearby and an ashen-faced KATE emerges.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wants to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAIR gives MARCUS a farewell hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CONNOR has a PRIVATE MEDICAL AREA set aside. He's not looking good-- pale, weak, only semi-conscious. I.V.s and MONITORS, other LIFE-SUPPORT EQUIPMENT. KYLE is with Conn staring at a small POLAROID PHOTO in his hand. CONNOR can barely speak above a whisper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her name was Sarah... she was... amazing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't remember my mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE starts to hand the photo back, CONNOR waves it away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE is a bit puzzled, but obediently keeps the snapshot. KATE enters with MARCUS, touches the boy's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle, could you give us a minute?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE reluctantly leaves, still looking at the photo, with nod to MARCUS on the way out. He joins STAR in the doorwa they go off together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KATE, CONNOR and MARCUS are alone now. Throughout scene, Kate fights to maintain a steely control-- but she's clea not far from tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KATE (cont'd) Marcus... you're going to need to be rebuilt. Your face, your body, your voice... (off his shrug) We have people who can do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls some MEDICAL DIAGRAMS out of a drawer, lays the before Marcus. He examines--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --a SCANNED IMAGE of his FACE, various elements HIGHLIGHT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KATE (cont'd) But you won't be the same...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS moves to the NEXT IMAGE-- it shows his features TRANSFORMED into another's-- something closer to JOHN CONNOR'S FACE, with a JAGGED SCAR over part of his featur

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KATE (cont'd) The scar will help hide the change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marcus lowers the papers, absorbing this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're asking me to become... (gesturing at Connor) Him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connor can barely speak above a whisper:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't keep him alive much longer. (shakes her head, swallows) Very few people know what John actually looks like. Only the technicians and our closest advisors need ever know the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who else? Only you know the enemy from the inside. You liberated a Skynet camp... you're a hero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connor gestures for Marcus to move closer, he speaks with great effort:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never knew how I was supposed to win this war. But I finally understand: the idea of John Connor is more important than the person. (sinks back, spent) I can die. He cannot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate leans toward Marcus, who's lost in thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please.   We need you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS bows his head for a long beat, as if seeking an an from within. Then he looks up again with resolve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lifts his hand-- the SKIN TATTERED, METAL exposed at finger joints-- and moves to take CONNOR'S TREMBLING HAND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLOW-MOTION, MOS - a SNOWY, MOUNTAINOUS ENVIRONMENT...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STEEL TERMINATORS go down in HAILS OF BULLETS.   We hear Marcus' VO, his voice strong and assured:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN ARMY of HUMAN RESISTANCE FIGHTERS marches through the SNOW, GUNS BLAZING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (V.O.) (cont'd) ...I shall fear no evil...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN H-K goes down IN FLAMES, SMASHES in the MOUNTAINSIDE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE GOLDEN EXPLOSION silhouettes a single FIGURE, who sta on a PROMONTORY, surveying the battle below. AIDES and SOLDIERS surround him, but he towers over them, giving orders, in complete control. MOVE IN SLOWLY on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (V.O.) (cont'd) I died, and was reborn. I wear another man's face, lead another man's life... yet only now do I have a reason for living. I once was lost, but now I'm found...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANOTHER BLAST illuminates his face for an instant-- scarr craggy, a blend of Marcus and Connor-- but fierce, determ and proud. [Perhaps shoot this with both actors.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCUS (V.O.) (cont'd) ...was blind, but now I see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE LIGHT FADES, shadowing him in darkness again and we..
